item.description:
Motorcycle and Tattoo Photoshoot on July 22th from 10:30 AM - 1:30 PM

Notes:

All proceeds from the shoot will benefit the injured members of the military.

Please pay before the July 14th (If you have not paid by July 14th your name will be removed from the list).

There will be three brand-new Harley Davidsons to be used in the shoot. The location will be in a warehouse (indoors, with large windows).

Models for this photoshoot are:

1) Amanda

2) Caitlin

3) Colleen

4) Maddie

 

NOTES: This is a production shoot with motorcycles from Harley Davidsons. According to regulation of the Harley Davidsons Company, models will not be allowed to show their midriff, so the outfit would be jean + leather, or short + open back, ..., etc.

If you are not happy with the changes above, you are welcome to withdraw from this shoot and I will refund your money (all you need is to email me to let me know)
item.name: SKIN & STEEL - Motorcycle and Tattoo Photoshoot
